content: Patient ZK-48827-24 (D.O.B. 02/19/1988) initiated treatment at Coastal Neurology Specialists for rare vestibular schwannoma under Horizon Premier plan. Initial claims filed 03/15/2023 show denial due to out-of-network provider status, though patient received prior authorization. Document includes clinical notes from Dr. Elise Tanaka regarding proton therapy scheduling conflicts with insurer's approved facility list.
